title: on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 

(Commencement) (No. 4) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic road act 2023 (commencement) (no 4) order 2024

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023),
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 
16 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

paragraph (l), insofar as it is not already in operation, and 

(b) paragraph (o), insofar as it relates to paragraph (f) of subsection 

(2) of section 78A. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

6 November, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [615] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
